entries.abort: Thanks...I always wanted to be left to the merch of walking furballs.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Be ready to strike. I am getting a lock on the vessel now.
entries.arrival_phase_2: The location has been sent to your navigation computer. I just want that freighter in one piece...kill everyone else.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: pcontrast3 < Enemy fighters incoming. > pcontrast3
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: pcontrast3 < Enemy fighters eliminated. > pcontrast3
entries.capture_complete: Freighter back under Trandoshan control. Escort it to safety.
entries.capture_phase_1: Good, someone came for me. Stand by while I get these engines back online.
entries.capture_phase_2: Engines are back online. We should go.
entries.complete: The freighter is safely starting landing procedures.
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: pcontrast3 < %DI Enemy fighters remaining. > pcontrast3
entries.escort_wiped_out: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: pcontrast3 < Enemy fighters eliminated. > pcontrast3
entries.failed_destroy: I wanted those collars. Now we will have to pay for another shipment.
entries.failed_escape: Maybe you should get a new ship if yours cannot fly down a simple freighter.
entries.panic_2: We really need to crush the resistance once and for all.
entries.panic_3: They just keep coming. Dumb animals.
entries.panic_4: Show them what you are worth.
entries.panic_5: Prove yourself and your honor...kill them all.
entries.quest_disable_d: Get the freighter to a stop so that the pilots can have a chance to get the navigation computer reset.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the freighter back to the landing site and protect it from any more attacks by the resistance.
entries.quest_location_d: The freighter is still inside the Kashyyyk system but might leave at any time.
entries.quest_recover_d: Once disabled the pilots should be able to get control of the vessel again.
entries.recovery_success: Good work, pilot. Come and see me when you return to the surface.
entries.target_disabled: Now...move in close and the freighter will be ours again.
entries.taunt_1: You will never collar us again!
entries.taunt_2: Prepare to face the rage of the Wookiee!
entries.taunt_3: We shall break the chains forever.
entries.taunt_4: You are nothing but a lackey of the Empire!
entries.taunt_5: I do not fear death! Do you?
entries.thanks_2: You sure taught those furballs a lesson.
entries.thanks_3: Blah...blah...blah...I am glad they are dead.
entries.thanks_4: I never thought they would shut up.
entries.thanks_5: I think I smell singed fur.
entries.title: Kashyyyk System: Collar Hunter
entries.title_d: Mssikss has lost one of her freighters to the resistance fighters and wants it back. The freighter contains very valuable control collars used to subdue the Wookiees after they are captured by slavers. The freighter is equipped with a homing signal that you should be able to track as long as it remains in the system.
